DOC.brief_summary: This study test combination drug naltrexone bupropion weight-concerned smoker investigate whether combination drug improve smoke cessation quit rate minimize post quit weight gain .
DOC.brief_title: Low-Dose Naltrexone Combined With Bupropion Stop Smoking With Less Weight Gain
DOC.detailed_description: This open label smoke cessation clinical trial 25 mg naltrexone 300 mg bupropion sustained-release ( SR ) six male fourteen female participant . This pilot study conduct determine : - effect size estimate smoke cessation post-cessation weight gain , use compute sample size need large-scale clinical trial ; - compliance combination 25 mg naltrexone 300 mg bupropion SR . In addition examine sample study , investigator plan compare sample sample match control .
